---- comment: We are only using 2 goods, 2 meds, and 2 bads.

rp_go_finished_good1.text: Perfect.  I am so ready for that slice.  This place is great.  I'll definitely be back!

rp_go_finished_good2.text: That's perfect.  You've been so helpful! I'm going to write a great review on Yelp. See you soon!

rp_go_finished_med1.text: Thanks. I felt a bit awkward, but I'm glad we figured it all out.

rp_go_finished_med2.text: Thanks. This whole thing was a little sketchy, but I'm glad we worked it out.

rp_go_finished_bad1.text: Ok, I never thought the slice could be this difficult.  You people seriously need to improve the service here.

rp_go_finished_bad2.text: Ok, that was seriosuly painful.  I'll definitely be posting on Yelp. Goodbye.

rp_go_finished_bad3.text: Now? Now you get a slice ready? Your customer service was disasterous. You can see yourself on my Instagram page - the worst pizza salesperson in history. SMILE!

rp_go_finished_bad4.text: Um, thank you I guess. I mean seriously, all you had to do was to sell me a slice. How can that be so hard? Isn't that what you do all day long? I truly hope the pizza is way better than your service.

rp_go_finished_bad5.text: Now I know why I haven't had pizza in such a long time - because of incompetent people like you. I mean, all I wanted to do was order a slice. Next time I'm getting frozen.

rp_40_write_it.text: Can you  repeat my order back to me?

rp_40_restate_order.text: How hard can this be?  I want a gluten free slice of sausage and mushroom.  Can you please read my order back to me?

rp_990_insulted_too_much.text: I think I'll go somewhere else for lunch.

rp_990_angry_leaving.text: Seriously?  I am definitely not coming back to this place.  Good Bye.
